CapturePayment.description: The transfer of currency from a customer account to a merchant account

anyOf.description: An approval from the issuer of a payment instrument that the customer has sufficient funds to cover the cost of the transaction

paymentAuthorizationStatus.description: Processing stage of the payment authorization

gatewayReferenceDetailsText.description: Data that will be used by the gateway for subsequent transactions

ipAddress.description: Unique network address of the device that originated the payment authorization request

macAddress.description: Unique hardware identification number of the device that originated the payment authorization request

expirationDate.description: Date when the authorization will no longer be valid

authorizationAmount.description: Payment amount that is being authorized to complete a purchase

availableBalanceAmount.description: Amount of currency that will be used to complete the payment once the authorization has been completed

totalPaymentCaptureAmount.description: Total of all payment captures related to the authorization

commentText.description: Descriptive text about the payment authorization

externalCreatedDate.description: Preserves original creation date for payments imported from external systems

paymentApplications.description: Applications for the payment, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)

anyOf.description: The designation of part or all of a payment to satisfy a claim on the payment funds

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Short description of the payment application

paymentApplicationInstance.description: Discriminator property identifying the specific payment application instance type, such as PaymentCreditMemoApplication

paymentApplicationType.description: Identifies the payment application as either Apply or Unapply

effectiveDate.description: Date when account balances will reflect the application of the payment

appliedDate.description: Effective date of the payment application to an invoice or credit memo

hasBeenUnapplied.description: True if the application of a payment to an invoice or credit memo has been reversed, false otherwise

unappliedDate.description: Date when the payment was unapplied to an invoice or credit memo

appliedAmount.description: Amount of currency of the payment applied to either an invoice or credit memo

paymentBalanceAmount.description: Unapplied portion of the payment amount that remains after application to an invoice or credit memo

commentText.description: Brief description of the payment application

externalCreatedDate.description: Preserves original creation date for payments imported from external systems

paymentAllocations.description: Additional allocations for the application, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)
